About Yuvastambh

The Pillar of Youth – Building sustainable communities through youth empowerment since 2015

Mission

To empower youth through education, skill development, and leadership training to create sustainable social impact in underserved communities across India.

Vision

A future where every young person has the opportunity to reach their full potential and become a pillar of positive change in their community.

Values

Integrity, empowerment, sustainability, inclusivity, and transparency guide everything we do.

Approach

Community-led, youth-focused programs that create lasting impact through education, livelihood, and advocacy.

Our Journey

A Decade of Impact

From a small initiative to a nationwide movement empowering thousands of youth.

2015

Foundation

Yuvastambh was founded with a vision to empower youth in rural India through education and skill development.

2017

First 1000

Reached our first milestone of empowering 1,000 youth across 20 villages in Maharashtra.

2019

Expansion

Expanded programs to 5 states, launching livelihood and entrepreneurship initiatives.

2021

Digital Transformation

Launched online learning platforms, reaching 5,000+ youth during the pandemic.

2023

10,000+ Lives

Crossed the milestone of empowering 10,000+ youth with sustainable skills and opportunities.

2025

Future Forward

Committed to empowering 50,000 youth by 2030 with enhanced programs and partnerships.
